name: Polr
body:
###Welcome to Polr

You can download the latest release by clicking the `tar.gz` or `zip` buttons. Polr is currently in the Beta stage, therefore, some things may still be buggy. If you are having any issues with Polr, please click [here](http://webchat.freenode.net/?channels=#polr)to join our support channel. You can also read the docs [here](https://github.com/Cydrobolt/polr/wiki/_pages). If you would like to contribute, click the `View on Github` button at the top right corner. 

###About Polr

Polr is a minimalist URL shortening framework written in PHP. However, you can easily integrate it into any web application that supports HTTP GET. Consult the [wiki page](https://github.com/Cydrobolt/polr/wiki/_pages) for examples in Python, PHP, and Node.js. 

###IRC Channel

Polr uses IRC for communication. We are on Freenode (irc.freenode.net:6667) at `#polr`.

###Polr URL Shortener

A "live demo" can be viewed here: [Polr.cf, the official URL shortener created by Polr developers](http://polr.cf). You can use this URL shortener any way you want. It is not solely for demo purposes, but rather is a full-blown URL shortener.

###Useful Links

#####[Report an Issue](https://github.com/Cydrobolt/polr/issues)
#####[Polr.cf, the official URL shortener created by Polr developers](http://polr.cf)
